title: Europe floods: Victims face massive clean-up as waters recede
content:
1. Europe floods: Victims face massive clean-up as waters recede  BBC News
  2. Desperate search for survivors as western Europe reels from a 'catastrophe of historic proportion'  CNN
  3. Flooding in Europe kills at least 150 with hundreds still missing | DW News  DW News
  4. AP PHOTOS: Swollen rivers smash through parts of Europe  Yahoo News
  5. In Germany's flood-battered Blessem, a 'surreal' limbo after parts of town swept away  The Washington Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: ヨーロッパで発生した洪水。水が引いた後、被災者は大規模な清掃作業に追われています。
